title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 227.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 227.2 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) The term "fire
chief" means the person who is head of the department or any title or rank that
includes the duties of fire chief in any fire department or fire company with
six (6) or more paid fire fighters. (b) The term "fire fighter" means a member of
a fire department whose duties include fire service as the phrase fire service
is defined in paragraph d of subdivision eleven of section
three hundred
two
of the retirement and social security
law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
227.2

Adopted by

New

York State Register June 2, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 22, eff. 6/2/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
